languages.text: "Очередной зарвавшийся бунтарь, нацепивший красную тряпку и устроивший погром ради обожания простолюдинов".
"Just another arrogant rebel, wrapping himself in a crimson rag and wreaking havoc for the adoration of the commoners."
languages.original_text: "Очередной зарвавшийся бунтарь, нацепивший красную тряпку и устроивший погром ради обожания простолюдинов".

traits.locale_text: "Just another overzealous rebel, wrapping himself in a crimson rag and wreaking havoc for the adoration of the commoners."
"Just another overzealous rebel, wrapping himself in a crimson rag and wreaking havoc for the adoration of the commoners."
"Just another overzealous rebel, wrapping himself in a crimson rag and wreaking havoc for the adoration of the commoners."
"Just another overzealous rebel, wrapping himself in a crimson rag and wreaking havoc for the adoration of the commoners."
"Just another arrogant rebel, wrapping himself in a crimson rag and wreaking havoc for the adoration of the commoners."
"Just another arrogant rebel, wrapping himself in a crimson rag and wreaking havoc for the adoration of the commoners."

languages.text: "Nur ein weiterer arroganter Rebell, der sich in rote Lumpen hüllt und für die Bewunderung des Pöbels Chaos stiftet."
languages.original_text: "Just another arrogant rebel, wrapping himself in a crimson rag and wreaking havoc for the adoration of the commoners."

traits.locale_text: "Nur ein weiterer arroganter Rebell, der sich in rote Lumpen hüllt und für die Bewunderung des Pöbels Chaos stiftet."

languages.text: «Tan solo es otro rebelde arrogante que se adorna con un trapo carmesí y siembra el caos para ganarse la adoración de la plebe».
languages.original_text: "Just another arrogant rebel, wrapping himself in a crimson rag and wreaking havoc for the adoration of the commoners."

traits.locale_text: «Tan solo es otro rebelde arrogante que se adorna con un trapo carmesí y siembra el caos para ganarse la adoración de la plebe».

languages.text: 「ただの傲慢な反逆者で、真紅の布に身を包み、平民に崇拝されたいがために大混乱を引き起こす者です」
languages.original_text: "Just another arrogant rebel, wrapping himself in a crimson rag and wreaking havoc for the adoration of the commoners."

traits.locale_text: 「ただの傲慢な反逆者で、真紅の布に身を包み、平民に崇拝されたいがために大混乱を引き起こす者です」

languages.text: “又一个傲慢的叛乱分子，用深红色的破布把自己包裹起来，大肆破坏，以此博得平民的爱戴。”
languages.original_text: "Just another arrogant rebel, wrapping himself in a crimson rag and wreaking havoc for the adoration of the commoners."

traits.locale_text: “又一个傲慢的叛乱分子，用深红色的破布把自己包裹起来，大肆破坏，以此博得平民的爱戴。”

languages.text: « Encore un rebelle qui se croit tout permis, tout ça parce qu'il porte un chiffon rouge sur la tête et qu'il sème la zizanie pour le plus grand plaisir des foules. »
languages.original_text: "Just another arrogant rebel, wrapping himself in a crimson rag and wreaking havoc for the adoration of the commoners."

traits.locale_text: « Encore un rebelle qui se croit tout permis, tout ça parce qu'il porte un chiffon rouge sur la tête et qu'il sème la zizanie pour le plus grand plaisir des foules. »

languages.text: "Kendini beğenmiş bir isyancı daha. Kendini kızıl paçavralarla sarıyor ve sıradan halkın sevgisini kazanmak için kargaşa yaratıyor."
languages.original_text: "Just another arrogant rebel, wrapping himself in a crimson rag and wreaking havoc for the adoration of the commoners."
